storyInfo: When she first arrived in Zeruertza, Pozëmka commissioned two Durin craftsmen for a fountain pen as a way to put her past behind her, only for them to run late with the delivery, leading her on a quest to find out what exactly was going on.

attributes.text: 'It must be sharper than any blade, colder than the harshest snowfields, and weightier than any memory.'
'Honestly, I don't know whether I'll be able to bear the stabbing pain in my heart to pick it up.'
'I'm not expecting to write anything with it. Perhaps, more than anything, I wish for it to become the final paragraph in my collection of the days of old.'

attributes.content: Those are the details of the job, and I guarantee you I memorized the whole thing down to the letter.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: Really? She was mumbling toward the end there. Are you sure you didn't mishear anything?
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: Anyway, it's been half a month. How do you even remember how quiet she was?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: I mean, don't you think it's weird? At first, she said she wanted a fountain pen, and would be fine with whatever design we came up with.
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: But all that stuff she said at the end... Are you sure that was meant for us, and not herself?
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Nope.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: —Wait, hold on. It's been half a month?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: And we still haven't started on the design?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: It's only been half a month. I hadn't sharpened my pencils, and... I was out of mead.
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Fair point. Okay, bottoms up.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: Bottoms up! —Ugh, dude, what do you think she was asking for, anyway?
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Look at her word choice... She probably meant she wants something that's good for fighting, something cold and heavy.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: Ohh, then probably some kind of huge ass weapon, made out of metal?
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: And we need to add something to give it a bit of a fountain pen look.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: Just a bit? Let's add that right here, then. It'll look great.
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Ooh, I like it! I mean, you just scribbled something on there, but this is a pretty decent blueprint!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: So... What is it?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: It looks like... a crossbow? What do you think?
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Oh yeah, I can see it, now that you mention it. Then I can start designing the structure. I daresay this is gonna be a masterpiece. Even more amazing than anything you've seen in Stranger Things.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: Yeah, that's what I'm talking about. And it better be, for a surface-dweller customer to walk away satisfied.
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Hear, hear. Bottoms up again!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: Well, that's all the work we have for today. Time to celebrate!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin?

attributes.content: '...This is the largest fluorescent mushroom in Zeruertzan history.'
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: *sigh*... This Legendary Explorer's Zeruertzan History Uncovered doesn't have much useful information.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Seventeen updated cave maps over three years... yet it doesn't go into the upheavals the city has faced, or the ambitions of those in power.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Perhaps I need to look for literature left behind by earlier outsiders, or learn Durish. Only then will I uncover Zeruertza's true history, apart from these suspiciously cheery broken sentences.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: ...After all, my eyes do not deceive me.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Everyone here is a binge drinker! Every! Last! One!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: No... Now that I've escaped that place... I need to put it all behind me.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Perhaps the Durins are the same. Why else would they be drowning their sorrows, if not to bury the memory of some shared trauma?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Until I can understand their pain, this unspoken taboo, I won't ever truly be one of them.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: They may act carefree, but I can tell they haven't fully accepted me. I can see the hostility behind their glances.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I mean, why else would there be no updates on my fountain pen after half a month?!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hello, Avdotya. Is something the matter?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Oh, my apologies. Am I talking too loudly in the library?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: After my long, lonesome journey, it's been hard to break the habit of speaking to myself.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Look at this! What did I tell you? They wrote about that nut ice cream eating competition we had in Issue 1201!
attributes.name: Tipsy Voice

attributes.content: Dude, you're holding it upside down. That's Issue 1051. Besides, that's not even you in the picture.
attributes.name: Comparatively Calm Voice

attributes.content: I think you're being relatively quiet, actually.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Anyway, you told me earlier you were afraid of the library's robots since they looked like... uh... military equipment, so I've made sure they won't approach you.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: If you're looking for anything specific, just ask me directly.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Really, all I need to know is how these books are sorted. That would help me find what I'm looking for.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hm... how the books are sorted... I remember there being a book on that.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: But I don't remember where it is. Hold on, let me get a ladder.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Shouldn't the sorting system dictate where it is?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hm, I don't remember that, either.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: I mean, 80% of the books here aren't where they're supposed to be anyway, according to the system.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: I appreciate your assistance.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But I think I'll take a walk around town. I'm sure that will help me assimilate.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Avdotya, since you love hanging out at the library so much, have you considered writing for Zeruertza?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: I'm very curious what surface-dwellers like those in Stranger Things think of our Durin city.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: I haven't.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I... Sorry, did I offend you?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: It's not you, it's me. This is a problem I must face on my own.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: To completely rid myself of my memories of the surface, I refuse to do anything that I used to do up there.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: That's a shame. So you're not hoping to be a writer? In that case, you should broaden your horizons somewhere more open.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: When you leave, just put anything you pulled off the shelves wherever you want. Also, be careful when you leave through the exit. Lately, we've been getting a lot of drunk Durins racing there.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: ...Thanks for the warning.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, but I have one more question.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: How do Durin surnames work?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: There aren't any rules. For example, I'm Silvermint. The chief is Eartheart...
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: So they're all objects or concepts.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: (To the Durins, these surnames are nothing unusual, yet I can't help but focus on the meaning behind them.)
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: ...I see. Thank you.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: An omnipresent artificial daylight... a city with no winter.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: How can I hide the breath of winter enveloping me? How do I avoid hurting the Durins' captious eyes?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If I must abandon my entire past and take refuge under the roof of strangers to avoid banishment or betrayal... All the better.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Here it is...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If I remember correctly, the two craftsmen's hut is around—
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: —Huh?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: A big slide... but there are no stairs leading up...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: There's half a trampoline, but no barriers...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: What are these things?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Excuse me. Why are all these entertainment facilities left half-finished, and what are they doing here?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Also, wasn't there a craftsman's shop that took commissions here?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hey! I caught another one!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: Caught...? Where are you taking me?!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: To the polls, of course!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: Oh, look how surprised you are. Have you been living under a rock? How could you have missed this street's renovation contest?!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: We're on the third wave of submissions!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: And to make it easy for the voters to decide how the street will be rebuilt, they added a new rule this time.
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: Every contestant must build part of their design, and then—
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: —the spectators vote for whichever one they want to see completed the most!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: How's that? That got you interested, didn't it?
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: No, not one bit. I just wanted to know where the people who used to be on this street went.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Were they chased away, just like that? Or were they exiled into the caves of Durin, where no daylight will ever reach...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Come on, let's get voting!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If this is your way of life, who am I to refuse?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But look how tall I am. I literally stand out from the crowd. What will the Durins think of me if my vote ends up in the minority?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Yeah, you sure are tall.
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: That's why you're the perfect candidate for record keeper! No one here can count votes better than you!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: We actually had three record keepers picked out before you, but not one of them came today. My guess is they're all drunk.
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: Which is why the position is open!
attributes.name: Thrilled Durin

attributes.content: Alright... Let's go, then.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: 20 votes for 'Super Alcohol Stirrer Bumper Cars'!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: And 309 abstentions!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: The majority didn't vote!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: *sigh*... The Durins' way of speaking is too hard to mimic.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: No matter how much I long to integrate into their way of life... it would seem I'm still reluctant to use a word like 'Recordkeeper' as my surname.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Why did so many folks abstain? Looks like we're gonna have to have a fourth contest.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Maybe entertainment facilities aren't popular anymore? Should we go for art sculptures as the next theme?
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Hah, whatever it ends up being, my design's gonna be way more popular than yours for sure!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: As designers participating in this contest, surely you two must be very familiar with the street?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Then would you happen to know of a workshop run by two craftsmen that used to be there half a month ago?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I commissioned them to make me a fountain pen, but they disappeared without a trace after they took the job.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: It's gotta be that place, right?
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Gotta be.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: What do you mean?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: They forgot about your commission.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: If not, they would've contacted you when their house was torn down.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Relax. It's just a fountain pen. It's not like it really matters.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: It matters to me.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, you're a big fan of fountain pens?
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: So are you into calligraphy? Or are you more into writing?
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Alright, alright, quit it with the long face. When we have a huge project going on, craftsmen who aren't drunk usually come help out. You'll bump into them eventually.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Say, when a victor is finally crowned in this contest.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Right. Speaking of the contest, I think you could give me some great ideas! Tell me, what's it like on the surface?
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Hey, I wanted to ask her about that!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: In that case, let's have a vote right now, and see who she'll share her inspirations from the surface with.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Alright!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: —Stop. Let's not.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: You don't want to tell us?
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: ...I'll tell both of you.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I just want someone to come up with a proposal that will win over every Durin, so I can look for the two craftsmen I commissioned as soon as possible.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: You were hunted?
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Oh—I get it! You're talking about those races where you can get in others' way!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Towering walls! But there was a standoff in a narrow corridor!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: A big reception hall! Where everyone got super drunk!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: That's violent! Super violent!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: I have an idea! Let's go!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Do these Durins really have no idea what it means to be hunted or poisoned?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: And I...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hold on. I just told them all those hideous truths.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: 'Inside her heart, there is nothing but towering stone walls that block out the cold wind, a corridor adorned with paintings, and a long table with nothing but hot food and fine wine on top...'
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: 'The moment she begins this sentence, she must continue her account and write about the walls that came crumbling down, the kind, tender faces in the painting that burnt away in the flames, and the blood red wine staining the white tablecloth.'
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I've spilt the wine. Now that they've been exposed to the idea of evil, they can no longer be rid of it. Right now, all I can do is...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: ..stop them from spreading my story through Zeruertza!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: How come I've never thought of this before? We could've held all our contests this way!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Right, now we can really battle it out with each other.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: This is— 'The Super Water Cannon Battle!'
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Look here. I'll put water guns at every window, guaranteed to blast whatever you end up building on the other side of street.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: But if only one of us gets her design chosen, we won't get our showdown, no?
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Hm, you're right.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: That's why we gotta team up and join the fourth contest together!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Great idea!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: You wanna advertise our brand new mead? Hm... Who're you?
attributes.name: Durin Who's Carrying a Whole Barrel in His Arms

attributes.content: I'm... a lover of fine drinks.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, you love our mead? You've got great tastes, lady.
attributes.name: Durin Who's Carrying a Whole Barrel in His Arms

attributes.content: Since I arrived, I've seen many a Durin have this drink, and a single cup is usually enough to knock them out... My guess is it's very strong.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hahaha, you know your stuff! Even I can get drunk for days on end with just two cups of this!
attributes.name: Durin Who's Carrying a Whole Barrel in His Arms

attributes.content: I imagine you're using an awfully large cup then.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But that's wonderful.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Let's delay no further and head out with the mead.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: (If I treat those two designers to mead as a promotion, not only will they harbor no suspicions, they'll drink until they are absolutely inebriated.)
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: (To keep them from spreading my story around, I just need the two of them to sleep past the deadline. They might even forget about it completely.)
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Alright, then. Let's share a toast to making this promotion a success!
attributes.name: Durin Who's Carrying a Whole Barrel in His Arms

attributes.content: Hold on, I've never had alcohol before...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: (After all those sharp gazes I've had to endure, I wouldn't dare drink or let myself fall asleep in the middle of the day...)
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: No, I mean, I need to stay sober for work. Why don't we have this drink later tonight?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I-I'll be off now!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hello, you two. Would you like to try some—
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hear, hear!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Well said, Master Finch!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: —They don't seem interested.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Amazing. The construct's contours are elegant and simple. There's absolutely no space wasted on any unnecessary surfaces.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: And he's right. With this design, the commercial district will have somewhat different lighting than our normal, direct artificial sunlight. With this kinda lighting, some products will look even more attractive.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: I can't wait to see Finch's genius designs brought to life!
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: And that's even though we were gonna turn that place into a entertainment facility.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: In that case, may all those who agree with this proposal raise their hands.
attributes.name: Voice on Stage

attributes.content: ...So many.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Even at a glance, I can tell the majority are in favor.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: But didn't that designer used to always complain on stage about the way the Durins live?!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Welp, that's our design down the drain.
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Finch's got a point though. Over a quarter the area in Zeruertza is already used for entertainment facilities.
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Oh hey, tall girl. Didn't see you there. Did you catch Finch's speech?
attributes.name: Expectant Durin

attributes.content: Yes, part of it.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I also happened to hear that you've abandoned the design you were working on—
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: That aroma! Fresh mead! No doubt about it!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: Since we've already broken the ice, might as well help ourselves!
attributes.name: Relaxed Durin

attributes.content: *sigh*... You don't have the slightest idea what he meant when he said you must live your lives with restraint, do you?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Well... this isn't so bad, either.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Make way! Make way! Finch made this vending truck just for us, and we're testing out its capabilities now!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: Faster, faster! Make a quick turn around that pillar up ahead!
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: You sure we have room to make a turn?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: We'll make this a crash test, then!
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Hm, seems safe enough. Maybe because we don't have anything in the back.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: ...Hello.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I've been waiting for you ever since work on this street started.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hm? Hmm... You seem somewhat familiar.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: Hey, do you remember who this is?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: What? You say something?
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: I mean, we're already lying here on the ground. I think maybe we should take a little nap first...
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: *sigh* Let me remind you, then.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I... I know this girl who commissioned two craftsmen on this street to make me a Durin-style fountain pen.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: She had books in her bag and the words of her homeland in her head, but she's unwilling to touch any of them again.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Whenever she lifts her pen, she is reminded of the snow-drenched cloak she wore, and begins writing letters that will never be sent.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Why won't they get sent? Did the railway to the next city break down or something?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: Sorry, I digress...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Anyway, she just wanted something as a token, to mark her sealing away of those bygone days, after which she can finally become...
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hm... what would she become?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: A scribe?
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: She wouldn't be completely saying goodbye to her past, then.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: So does she want this fountain pen or not?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: ...Never mind.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: In this story, we'll let her become a mead salesperson! Then, she'll drink merrily along with everyone else, and the smell of the alcohol will reach every corner of the artificial lake!
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh! Ohh! I like how this story turns out! I love it!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: It's a good thing we didn't have anything in the back of the truck. That said, I did put two barrels of mead in there!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: What? You brought mead? You should've said so! I would've stood up so much sooner!
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Come, cheers!
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: —I'll have a cup too. Thanks.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Um, actually, about twenty days ago, I commissioned you two to make me a fountain pen.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: So... may I ask where it is?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, oh! It's you! Now I remember!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: We finished it alright, but we forgot who gave us the commission.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: Hold on... a fountain pen?
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: I don't think we made a fountain pen.
attributes.name: Indolent Durin

attributes.content: Technically, part of it is a fountain pen.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: But long story short, we made a crossbow.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: A crossbow?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I... Why would I want a weapon?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Well, I forgot who you were, but I still remember what you told us.
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: Your description was too vivid. I had no idea why someone would want to stab their heart with a pen, but I felt it like a crossbow bolt through my heart!
attributes.name: Meticulous Durin

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Hm... Do you think you could make me an actual fountain pen this time? Also, I'd like a typewriter, too.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Avdotya, you're back.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Right, I want to look for magazines popular among the Durins, to see what kind of advertising copy draws their attention.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I'm pretty sure you can find those on the bookshelves right by the door. I mean, lots of people flip through them every day!
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Many thanks.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Right, Avdotya. Avdotya... Have I seen your name somewhere recently?
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: Yes, I gave myself a Durin-style surname to make it easier to send in submissions.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Which has to mean I saw your name in a recent magazine.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: And I thought you didn't want to write anymore.
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: ...There were two Durins who made me a collectible that's even more suited for sealing away my past.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: As for the fountain pen and typewriter... there's no harm in continuing to use them.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: Oh, I've found it! Avdotya...
attributes.name: Deculture Silvermint

attributes.content: ...'Razorpen.'
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: I... I must keep writing.
attributes.name: Avdotya

attributes.content: After all, I know I can't truly leave it behind me.
attributes.name: Avdotya
